title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open
description: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor that is already open, it has no effect.
OB: When I select a file in the Navigator and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', nothing happens. The existing editor used for the file is not changed.
EB: When I select a file in the Navigator and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', a new editor should be opened for the file, even if it is of a different type.
SR:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that a new editor is opened for the file, even if it is of a different type.
